model

Class BorrowedThing

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BorrowedThing

  • @Entity
public class BorrowedThing
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for Borrowed things. Used in the creation of the database table for Borrowed items through Hibernate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor to create borrowed items.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BorrowedThing

        public BorrowedThing()
        Constructor to create borrowed items. No parameters.

      • BorrowedThing

        public BorrowedThing(java.lang.String description,
                     java.sql.Date dateBorrowed,
                     java.sql.Date returnDate,
                     Person person)
        Constructor to create borrowed items.
        Parameters:
        description - String describing what the borrowed item is. That is, its name
        dateBorrowed - Date on which the item is borrowed
        returnDate - Date on which the item is returned
        person - the person to whom the item is loaned. It refers to the right person in the Person table in the database.

      • BorrowedThing

        public BorrowedThing(int thing_id,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     java.sql.Date dateBorrowed,
                     java.sql.Date returnDate,
                     Person person)
        Constructor to create borrowed items. Includes thing_id as parameter.
        Parameters:
        thing_id - identification number given to the borrowed item
        description - String describing what the borrowed item is. That is, its name
        dateBorrowed - Date on which the item is borrowed
        returnDate - Date on which the item is returned
        person - the person to whom the item is loaned. It refers to the right person in the Person table in the database.
        returned - boolean indicating whether or not the item has been returned.
